name: Hochseilgarten
description:
Experience nature and thrilling action at 5-14 metres above the ground.
The new high rope course is in the middle of a forest in a canyon called "Zemm­schlucht" between Mayrhofen and Ginzling.
30 stations spread over 2 varied courses present a very real challenge. The high rope course was built around natural trees at heights of between 5 to 14 metres and impresses intrepid climbers with views of an 88 metre drop at its highest point.
A professional team is on hand to take care of visitors personally.
